description: Change of use of lower ground floor from redundant carparking to office accommodation (Use Class E) with associated elevational changes, car parking spaces and PV panels on the roof
decision_conditions: <span id="docs-internal-guid-1b316026-7fff-33b3-91b6-d545932b7671"><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.2; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">Landscaping and lighting</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.2; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">Detailed drawings/full particulars of the proposed development showing the matters set out below must be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority, in writing, prior to occupation of the development.&nbsp;</span></p><ol style="margin-bottom: 0px; padding-inline-start: 48px;"><li dir="ltr" style="list-style-type: lower-alpha; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; margin-left: 36pt;" aria-level="1"><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.2; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;" role="presentation"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">full landscaping scheme including playspace details. The works shall be carried out within a period of twelve months from the date at which the development of the site commences or shall be carried out in the first planting (and seeding) season following completion of the development.</span></p></li><li dir="ltr" style="list-style-type: lower-alpha; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; margin-left: 36pt;" aria-level="1"><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.2; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;" role="presentation"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">a suitable scheme for the installation of no-dig, 3-dimensional cellular confinement surfaces for the protection of proposed trees.</span></p></li><li dir="ltr" style="list-style-type: lower-alpha; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; margin-left: 36pt;" aria-level="1"><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.2; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;" role="presentation"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">a detailed external lighting plan detailing light coverage and spill (including lux levels) across the site and sensor details</span></p></li></ol><br><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.2; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">The landscaping shall be maintained in accordance with the details hereby approved for at least five years; such maintenance is to include the replacement of any plants that die, or are severely damaged, seriously diseased, or removed.</span></p><br><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.2; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">The development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thus approved which shall be implemented in full prior to the first occupation of the development and retained in perpetuity.</span></p><br><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.2; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">REASON: In the interest of the amenity of the site, biodiversity and amenity of residents</span></p><div><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;"><br></span></div></span>

<p>Construction logistics and management plan</p><p>Prior to commencement of above ground works, a detailed Construction Logistics and Management Plan covering the matters set out below must be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. </p><p>The plan must demonstrate the adoption and use of the best practicable means to reduce the effects of noise, vibration and dust from the site. &nbsp; </p><p>The development shall only be implemented in accordance with the details and measures approved as part of the construction management plan, which shall be maintained throughout the entire construction period.&nbsp;The construction management plan covering all phases of above ground works shall include but not be limited to the following: </p><p>i) A method statement covering all phases of above ground works of the project to include details of noise, vibration and dust control measures.&nbsp;&nbsp;</p><p>ii) A demolition and construction method statement covering all phases of above ground works to include details of noise control measures, measures to prevent asbestos and other debris and measures to preserve air quality (including a risk assessment of the demolition and construction phase);&nbsp;</p><p>iii) Details and locations of all noisy activities including mobile plant machinery, and details of the best practicable means of mitigation employed against noise and vibration in accordance with British Standard Code of Practice BS 5228.</p><p>iv) Details of the locations where deliveries will be undertaken; the size and number of lorries expected to access the site daily; the access arrangements (including turning provision if applicable); construction traffic routing; details of parking suspensions (if required) and the duration of construction.</p><p>v) Deliveries to site and associated with removal of plant, equipment, machinery and waste from the site must only take place within the permitted hours detailed above.</p><p>vi) Procedures for maintaining good public relations including complaint management, public consultation and liaison - Arrangements for liaison with the Council’s Community Safety Team.</p><p>vii) Details of measures to reduce the environmental impact of the works on the northern embankment such as those to reduce dust deposition and impact from vibration etc&nbsp;</p><p>REASON: To ensure that occupiers of residential premises do not suffer a loss of amenity by reason of noise nuisance during site activities<br></p>

<span id="docs-internal-guid-6b8387db-7fff-2f34-b80c-3fde70cc2151"><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.2; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">Permitted development restriction</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.2; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended by any order revoking and re-enacting that Order with or without modification) no change of use within Schedule 2, Part 3 shall be carried out without an express application for planning permission.</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.2; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">REASON: To ensure the retention of commercial floorspace in the borough</span></p><div><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;"><br></span></div></span>

<span id="docs-internal-guid-15def12d-7fff-ea41-9507-809aa0667b11"><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.2; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">Energy statement</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.2; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">The development shall be implemented in accordance with the measures identified in the </span><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">name prepared by&nbsp;</span><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;"><span id="docs-internal-guid-1cd0028c-7fff-40b9-2d55-a47acd79beea"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;"><i>Energy &amp; Sustainability Statement</i> prepared by eb7</span></span>&nbsp;hereby approved.&nbsp;</span></p><br><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.2; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">REASON: In the interest of sustainability</span></p><div><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;"><br></span></div></span>

<span id="docs-internal-guid-673c32ae-7fff-ddef-e809-a95034de2ecd"><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">Prior to the occupation of the development, the waste storage facilities hereby permitted, shall be implemented in full&nbsp; and shall be maintained as such for the lifetime of the development.&nbsp;</span></p><br><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">REASON: To ensure sufficient refuse and recycling storage within the development</span></p><br><br></span>

<span id="docs-internal-guid-daa15c38-7fff-8103-26ac-c6b89085abd9"><ul></ul><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.2; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">Prior to occupation of the development, details of a parking design and management plan shall be submitted in writing to the Local Planning Authority for their approval in writing. This should include:</span></p><ul style="margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0;padding-inline-start:48px;"><li dir="ltr" style="list-style-type: disc; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;" aria-level="1"><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.2; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;" role="presentation"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">provision of blue badge spaces including how an additional 7% of dwellings can be provided with one designated space per dwelling in future if existing provision becomes insufficient</span></p></li><li dir="ltr" style="list-style-type: disc; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;" aria-level="1"><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.2; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;" role="presentation"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">installation of electric charging points for 6 electric cars and passive provision for remaining spaces</span></p></li></ul><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.2; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">The details shall be implemented in accordance with the details approved and retained for the lifetime of the development</span></p><p style="line-height: 1.656; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span id="docs-internal-guid-6cb35973-7fff-08f3-c6c0-d8f0c10cfcd2"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.2; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;"><br></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.2; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">REASON: To provide accessible parking and to promote active and sustainable means of transport</span></p><div><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;"><br></span></div></span>

<p>Within 12 weeks of occupation of the development hereby approved, a BREEAM post-construction assessment (or any assessment scheme that may replace it) confirming an ‘Excellent’ rating (or another scheme target of equivalent or better environmental performance) and where possible achieve the maximum number of water credits has been achieved shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority</p><p>REASON: In the interest of the promotion of sustainable forms of development and construction</p>

<p>Non-Road Mobile Machinery</p><p>All Non-Road Mobile Machinery (NRMM) of net power of 37kW and up to and including 560kW used during the course of the demolition, site preparation and construction phases shall comply with the emission standards set out in chapter 7 of the GLA’s supplementary planning guidance “Control of Dust and Emissions During Construction and Demolition” dated July 2014 (SPG), or subsequent guidance. Unless it complies with the standards set out in the SPG, no NRMM shall be on site, at any time, whether in use or not, without the prior written consent of the local planning authority. The developer shall keep an up to date list of all NRMM used during the demolition, site preparation and construction phases of the development on the online register at <a href="https://nrmm.london/.">https://nrmm.london/.</a></p><p>REASON: To contribute to the protection of air quality during construction</p>

<span id="docs-internal-guid-12929ef3-7fff-f243-623e-ba4b7a5a80bf"><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.2; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">Deliveries and servicing</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.2; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">Prior to the occupation of the development, a Delivery and Servicing Plan shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority, in consultation with Transport for London, setting out:</span></p><span id="docs-internal-guid-db232f1b-7fff-4540-1187-75a1c1fe8e0f"><ul><li style="line-height: 1.44; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">Frequency of deliveries per day/week&nbsp;</span></li><li style="line-height: 1.44; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">Size of vehicles</span></li><li style="line-height: 1.44; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">How vehicles would be accommodated on the public highway</span></li><li style="line-height: 1.512; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">Identify measures to mitigate the impact of servicing and deliveries</span></li><li style="line-height: 1.512; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">How sustainable freight will be encouraged and enabled, for example through the provision of on-site cargo cycle parking</span></li></ul></span><p style="list-style-type: disc; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; margin-left: 17.4331pt; padding-left: 3.25984pt;"></p><p style="list-style-type: disc; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; margin-left: 17.4331pt; padding-left: 3.25984pt;"><ul></ul></p><p style="line-height: 1.2; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><br></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.2; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">Thereafter deliveries and servicing shall be carried out in accordance with the approved plan.</span></p><br><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.2; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">REASON: To ensure that the proposed development does not prejudice the free flow of traffic or public safety along the neighbouring highway(s).</span></p><div><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;"><br></span></div></span>

<span id="docs-internal-guid-46253627-7fff-6123-5ac9-154142cd7b5b"><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">Prior to the commencement of above ground construction, a policy compliant cycle parking plan is required, which includes:</span></p><ul style="margin-bottom: 0px; padding-inline-start: 48px;"><li dir="ltr" style="list-style-type: disc; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;" aria-level="1"><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;" role="presentation"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">details of layout, foundation, stand type and spacing, of all cycle parking spaces</span></p></li><li dir="ltr" style="list-style-type: disc; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;" aria-level="1"><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;" role="presentation"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">two tier racks with a mechanical or pneumatically assisted system for accessing the upper level.</span></p></li><li dir="ltr" style="list-style-type: disc; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;" aria-level="1"><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;" role="presentation"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">5% of the spaces should be for larger cycles</span></p></li></ul><br><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">The storage spaces and stands must be kept in good working condition, in accordance with the above details, for the lifetime of the development.&nbsp;</span></p><br><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">REASON: To ensure that adequate provision for the safe and secure storage of bicycles is made for future occupiers and in the interest of safeguarding highway safety.</span></p><div><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;"><br></span></div></span>

<span id="docs-internal-guid-f7a6cec1-7fff-0050-736d-379dd521653f"><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.2; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">Commercial Units</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.2; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">The office floorspace hereby approved shall at all times be used only for the approved uses being Class E (g)(i) (Offices to carry out any operational or administrative functions) and for no other purposes under the Schedule to the Town and Country Planning (Use Classes) Order 2015 or in any provision equivalent to that Class in any statutory instrument revoking and re- enacting that Order.&nbsp;</span></p><br><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.2; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">REASON: In order to safeguard the provision of commercial floorspace to meet the needs of future residents</span></p><div><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;"><br></span></div></span>

<p>All new external facing and roofing materials in respect of all the works hereby approved (and any other incidental works carried out in this connection) shall match those of the existing building in respect of materials used, detailed execution and finished appearance</p><p>

REASON: To ensure the materials are high quality design</p>

The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this permission.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.


REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.
subdivision_of_building: redundant lower ground floor (formerly car park)
